p: In this context, the present work aimed at, firstly, re-examining the status of sunflower pollination in Central Italy by characterising the pollinator assemblage and its influence on seed set and oil content of modern sunflower varieties; and secondly, following recent studies that demonstrate the role of land use composition on ecosystem service provisioning [ 52â€“ 54], it aimed at disentangling the effect of local and landscape land use types on pollination service delivery.
